message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with natural language processing and specifically focuses on improving the accuracy of downstream neural QA systems by mitigating the effects of noise from Automatic Speech Recognition systems. This suggests that the paper could belong to the following sub-categories: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and understanding. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves the use of machine learning techniques to improve the accuracy of QA systems. 
- cs.LG (Learning) as it involves training models on a synthetic corpus and evaluating on human corpora. 
- cs.SD (Sound) as it deals with Automatic Speech Recognition systems and their impact on downstream QA systems. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as QA systems involve retrieving relevant information from a given text or speech input.
